thread.title: Tottenham vs Chelsea: Eden Hazard with miss of the season contender as Blues try to get level

author: jgordon
title: Tottenham vs Chelsea: Eden Hazard with miss of the season contender as Blues try to get level
text:
HOW HAZ HE MISSED? Tottenham vs Chelsea: Eden Hazard with miss of the season contender as Blues try to get level 
Belgian's tame header rivals Jesse Lingard hitting the post from three yards against West Ham for worst effort of 2017 By JAMIE GORDON Comments EDEN HAZARD produced a miss of the season contender as Chelsea try to peg back Tottenham. 
The Belgian somehow headed wide from point-blank range as the ball found him at the far post. Reuters 3 Eden Hazard nods wide with the goal at his mercy 
It is possible Hazard was worried about Jan Vertonghen closing him down as he tamely nodded past the upright when proper contact would have sen a certain goal. 
Follow the second half action from Tottenham vs Chelsea with our live blog 
The shocker comes after Jesse Lingard hit the post from three yards with the goal gaping at West Ham. 
This year has already seen some of the best and worst finishes you will ever witness with Henrikh Mhktaryan and Olivier Giroud producing brilliant scorpion kicks. Reuters Dele Alli broke the deadlock in first half injury time with a fine header Sportimage 3 Jesse Lingard hits his rebound against the post 
To make matters worse for Chelsea, Dele Alli headed in his second of the game moments later to leave the Blues on the bring of seeing their 13-game winning streak broken. Antonio Conte has continuously played down Chelsea's winning run to great effect
